alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 10:10PM MST until February 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet from Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday. * WHERE...Southern Mountains. * WHEN...From 2 PM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Significant winter driving conditions can be expected Tuesday into Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lingering snow showers tonight will produce little to no accumulation. Therefore, the Winter Weather Advisory which was in effect has been cancelled.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
